name: Rural Investment Support for Europe Foundation
membership: The European Landowners' Organization (ELO) and the Friends of the Countryside (FCS)are both founders, close cooperation exists between RISE and these two organisations but there are no formal ties.  As a public utility Foundation, all the work of the Foundation remains independant and is not on the behalf of any interest group
goal: RISE is a public utility foundation which aims to promote a sustainable, profitable and internationally competitive rural economy across Europe and to preserve the European countryside, its environment and biodiversity, and its cultural heritage and traditions.  It works through think tank work on agricultural and environmental issues, and by providing a platform for debate on key issues that affect the future environmental sustainability of European agriculture.
euInitiatives:
Common Agricultural Policy
Environmental Policies, such as the Nitrates Directive
H2020 focus areas
The Circular Economy Action Plan (including the Fertilisers Regulation review)
